001package net.tvburger.jdl.model.distances;
002
003import net.tvburger.jdl.common.patterns.StaticUtility;
004
005/**
006 * Utility for obtaining (singleton) instances of distance metrics.
007 */
008@StaticUtility
009public final class Metrics {
010
011    private static final EuclideanDistance euclideanDistance = new EuclideanDistance();
012
013    private Metrics() {
014    }
015
016    /**
017     * Gets the Euclidean metric.
018     *
019     * @return the Euclidean metric
020     */
021    public static EuclideanDistance euclidean() {
022        return euclideanDistance;
023    }
024
025}
